defectClassification.name: E2E Test Defect Classification Template
defectClassification.template_text: Analyze this inspection image and classify the defect type. Image: {image_path}. Context: {sensor_data}. Expected output: defect classification (crack, corrosion, wear, none).

failurePrediction.name: E2E Test Failure Prediction Template
failurePrediction.template_text: Based on the following equipment telemetry data: {telemetry}, predict the failure probability. Include confidence score and remaining useful life estimate.

anomalyDetection.name: E2E Test Anomaly Detection Template
anomalyDetection.template_text: Analyze this sensor data stream: {sensor_stream}. Identify any anomalies and classify them. Expected output: anomaly type (spike, drift, pattern_break, none) with explanation.

calibrationInsights.name: E2E Test Calibration Insights Template
calibrationInsights.description: Generate calibration recommendations from MC results
calibrationInsights.template_text: Review these Monte Carlo simulation results: {mc_results}. Provide calibration recommendations and confidence intervals.
